name: Tetris Clone (VulpesM)
description:
You will find the following info in the game:

"Highest Score" : As the name suggests, this is the higher score you made playing the game.

"Points" - This is your points in the current game. It resets every time you get a Game Over.  The points are calculated using the tetris rule:

Lines Cleared:123TETRISPoints:100300500800

"Level" - The level incrises every 60s and the pieces go down slightly faster.

"Coins" -  By now there is no application yet. But you gain Coins as you make points, like this:

Points: 100300500800Coins: 103050100

Hope you like it :)
